Since the start of the pandemic I’ve made the research development and manufacturing of a COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drugs a top priority because I believe in order to get back to normal we need a safe and effective vaccine.

This is about saving lives. It's about supporting our healthcare frontline heroes. It's about protecting Montana jobs & workers and rebuilding our economy. It's about American innovation. It's about restoring hope. It's about restoring normalcy into our way of life.
